name: Can't bear zoos
description:
Free the animal from their cages !

Arrow keys - Move

Space - Open the cage / Free the animals at (Exit) point !

A game made for No-Crunch Game Jam from Strasbourg Games Community by AtelierRaza(graph), kermitsxb(dev), hairaz (dev), JohanyB(music).

Using Chicken Pie font from https://www.dafont.com/fr/chicken-pie.font
